alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 2:06PM CST until January 25 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Homochitto River At Rosetta affecting Franklin County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Homochitto River at Rosetta. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Water begins to spread into agricultural lands along the river. Equipment and livestock should be removed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 20.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Homochitto River Rosetta 19.0 15.5 Wed 1 pm CST 14.8 7.5 4.9 &&
info.instruction: To escape rising water, take the shortest path to higher ground. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM CST.
